This page covers biological details of component Substantia Nigra Pars Compacta.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Forebrain Telencephalon -> Basal Ganglia (BGA.FT.BG) -> Substantia Nigra (BGA.FT.SN) -> Substantia Nigra Pars Compacta (BGA.FT.SN.PC) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: nucleus
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaECA Forebrain - Execution Control Area]
  * *Role*: relay
  * *Function*: Fine motor control, temporal processing
  * *Notes to function*: Supply striatum with dopamine, input to Basal Ganglia
